2. Prader-Willi Syndrome (PWS): This is a genetic disorder characterized by hypotonia, short stature, obesity, and cognitive impairment. It is caused by the absence of functional copies of certain genes on chromosome 15. In this context, it is being referred to as a disease or condition.
